ygData.subject: Re: Follow up questions to Arch-Magi Answers Volume V - 2.3.00
ygData.msgSnippet: ... As far as I could tell, this song never had a memory blur component.  Its taunt effect was sufficient to pull mobs off others in most cases, but I never
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 4 Feb 2000, Rokenn Swiftsong wrote:
>
> Q: Is Kellin's Lucid Lullaby (Lvl 15) supposed to have a memory blur
> component?
> A: Nope.
>
> Follow up: The old spell lists from Beta indicate that Lullaby nix'd the
> hate list. And in the first few months of retail it did so as well (work

As far as I could tell, this song never had a memory blur
component. Its taunt effect was sufficient to pull mobs off
others in most cases, but I never had an instance where I
could "rescue" a random player being beat up by a mob by
simply pulsing this song once.

> Q: Ok this is a personal question and probably completely trivial, the
> enameled black chestplate from lower guk is a black plate that is wearable
> by all the plate wearing classes except Bard. I wear an inferior black plate
> because I like the black plate look, can this plate be made available to
> Bards?
> A: No reason. I changed it so that Bards can use it too - should be in this
> patch.

This actually went in a couple patches ago. I noticed it when
my paladin friend listed off the stats on a BE BP we got from
the Savant a couple weeks ago.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
